Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Land Melee, Ranged, Ranged Cavalry, and Anti-Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit]Builders start with +2 [ICON_Charges] Charges.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture per [ICON_District] Specialty District in a City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty and +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in Cities with a [ICON_Fortified] Garrisoned Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Pillaged] Pillage rewards from [ICON_District] Districts, [ICON_Charges] Improvements, and [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
[ICON_Bullet]Unit Maintenance is reduced by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% Discount on upgrading Units with [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Resource_Iron] Strategic Resources.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes; additional bonus in international destination; [ICON_Alliance] Allied destinations gain these bonus yields as well.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy influence point per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Envoy sent to any existing City-State.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Culture] Culture adjacency for the [ICON_DISTRICT_THEATER] Theater Square.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities with at least 3 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production adjacency for the [ICON_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE] Industrial Zone.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency for the [ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Light Cavalry, Ranged Cavalry, and Heavy Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+30% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Science] Ancient to Renaissance Era [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonders.
[ICON_Bullet]+5% [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture per City-State Suzerainty.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities and [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities with a [ICON_Governor] Governor that has at least 2 [ICON_Promotion] Promotions.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all [ICON_Unit] Units beginning the turn in friendly territory.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Unit] Siege class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and +4 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty in Cities [ICON_Occupied] not founded by the player.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Science] Science in [ICON_Buildings] Temple.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Faith] Faith in [ICON_Buildings] University.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+15% [ICON_Culture] Culture in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-30% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Charges] Farms can be built on [ICON_Terrain] Tundra.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold on [ICON_Terrain] Tundra, Tundra Hill, Snow, and Snow Hill [ICON_Charges] Mines.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Mountains become workable and yield 1 [ICON_Food] Food.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Mountains gain standard [ICON_Food] Food adjacency from [ICON_Charges] Farms.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Terrain] Mountains gain standard [ICON_Production] Production adjacency from [ICON_Charges] Mines.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Siege class Units gain +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for every adjacent [ICON_Unit] Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Military Units earn [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points equal to 10% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Naval Melee and Ranged class Units earn [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points equal to 20% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Heavy Cavalry class Units when attacking; bonus doubled when attacking a [ICON_Fortified] Fortified Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Heavy, Light, and Ranged Cavalry class Units when attacking.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Light Cavalry against Land Ranged and Siege Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking and -5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against [ICON_Strength] Melee attacks for [ICON_Unit] Land Melee and Anti-Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for [ICON_Unit] Naval Melee, Ranged, Raider, and Aircraft class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increased by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for embarked [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increased by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Ranged] Range when occupying a [ICON_District] District, +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in or adjacent to home territory, and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_Unit] Naval Units for [ICON_Unit] Land Siege class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increased by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
